item.title: 欧洲在电动汽车电池领域的巨大希望是如何破灭的？
item.description: 面对中国的主导地位，欧洲在绿色技术领域引领世界的雄心壮志有可能逐渐破灭。电动汽车电池是低碳经济的重要推动力，其前景尤其暗淡。【原文：Europe’s ambitions to lead the world in green technologies risk fizzling out in the face of China’s dominance. The outlook is especially bleak when it comes to electric vehicle batteries, an important driver of the low-carbon economy.】

item.title: 交易员期待 CPI 为美联储押注提供参考，国债走势受阻
item.description: 随着投资者将注意力转向债券拍卖和一份关键的通胀报告，以寻找美联储下一步行动的线索，美国政府债务的溃败暂停了。【原文：The rout in US government debt paused as investors turned their attention to bond auctions and a key inflation report for clues on the Federal Reserve’s next steps.】

item.title: 世界银行称马来西亚必须削减汽油补贴以实现预算目标
item.description: 据世界银行称，马来西亚必须在今年内取消国家对其最广泛使用的汽油的全面支持，政府才能实现自己的补贴支出目标。【原文：Malaysia will have to unwind blanket state support for its most widely used gasoline by this year for the government to meet its own subsidy spending target, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油出口连续四周攀升至七月以来最高水平
item.description:
炼油厂减产促进原油出口，即使产量自二月份以来首次低于欧佩克+的目标

。【原文：

Refinery run cuts boost crude for export even as production trails OPEC+ target for the first time since February

】

item.title: Vasle 称欧洲央行下周降息不能保证 12 月行动
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员 Bostjan Vasle 表示，10 月份的降息并不意味着欧洲中央银行一定会在今年的最后一次会议上再次降息。【原文：Reducing interest rates in October wouldn’t mean that the European Central Bank is certain to do so again at its final meeting of the year, according to Governing Council member Bostjan Vasle.】

item.title: 外资购买菲律宾股票创十年来最佳记录
item.description: 海外投资者已经连续 27 个交易日抢购菲律宾股票，创下十年来最长的连续抢购纪录，因为当地通胀的缓解为更多的降息带来了希望。【原文：Overseas investors have snapped up Philippine shares for 27 consecutive trading sessions, matching the longest such streak in a decade, as easing local inflation buoys hopes for more interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 对冲基金经理格雷格-科菲寻找新的土耳其交易品种
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，宏观交易员兼对冲基金经理格雷格-科菲（Greg Coffey）正在寻找投资土耳其的新理由，并在最近几周访问了土耳其，进行了会谈。【原文：Macro trader and hedge fund manager Greg Coffey is looking for fresh reasons to invest in Turkey and visited the country in recent weeks for talks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德与大亨支持的杨忠礼将收购新加坡酒店式公寓
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. and the hotel unit of Malaysian developer YTL Corp. are set to purchase a group of serviced apartments in a prime office building in Singapore’s Central Business District, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 新加坡电信服务中断影响紧急呼叫
item.description: 新加坡最大的电信运营商新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）表示，包括公共服务热线在内的一些客户可能会遇到 "间歇性固定语音服务问题"。【原文：Singapore’s largest telecoms operator Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. said some customers, including public service hotlines, may be experiencing “intermittent fixed voice service issues.”】

item.title: 泰国预计明年游客人数将达到大流行前水平
item.description: 在 Trip.com Group Ltd.和 Expedia Group Inc.等公司的帮助下，泰国当局吸引游客，预计明年抵达泰国的外国游客将达到 4,000 万人次，超过疫情爆发前的记录。【原文：Thailand expects foreign tourist arrivals to reach 40 million next year, topping the pre-pandemic record with authorities enlisting the help of companies including Trip.com Group Ltd. and Expedia Group Inc. to lure travelers.】

item.title: 英国考虑放宽部分贸易公司的市场准入
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）局长周二将表示，英国可能会允许不持有零售存款的专业交易机构更容易进入市场。【原文：The UK could allow easier market access for specialist trading houses that don’t hold retail deposits, the head of the Financial Conduct Authority will say on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音和空中客车公司减产，航空航天高级供应商减少
item.description: Senior Plc 的跌幅为四年多来最大，因为这家英国航空航天零部件供应商警告说，由于供应链问题和美国飞机制造商的瘫痪性罢工，近期对空中客车公司和波音公司的销售额将下降。【原文：Senior Plc fell the most in more than four years after the UK aerospace parts supplier warned of lower near-term sales to Airbus SE and Boeing Co. amid supply chain issues and a crippling strike at the US planemaker.】

item.title: 住宅建筑商发布盈利警告后，Vistry 股价暴跌
item.description: Vistry Group Plc 的跌幅是八年来最大的，因为这家住宅建筑商称调整后的全年利润将比之前预测的低 8000 万英镑（1.05 亿美元）。【原文：Vistry Group Plc fell by the most in eight years after the homebuilder said adjusted profit would be £80 million ($105 million) lower than previously forecast for the full year.】

item.title: 条款显示，CVC领导的Zabka公司可能将IPO定价定在区间顶部
item.description: 欧洲最大的连锁便利店扎布卡集团（Zabka Group SA）的首次公开募股可能会在需求充足的情况下定价在拟议区间的顶端。【原文：The initial public offering of Europe’s largest chain of convenience stores, Zabka Group SA, is likely to price at the top of a proposed range amid ample demand.】

item.title: 瑞典扩张暂停，Northvolt 公司申请破产
item.description: 作为战略审查的一部分，陷入困境的电池制造商 Northvolt AB 暂停了其瑞典旗舰工厂的业务扩张，此后该公司的一家子公司申请破产。【原文：A subsidiary of Northvolt AB has filed for bankruptcy after the struggling battery maker paused the expansion of operations at its flagship Swedish factory as part of a strategic review.】

item.title: 英伟达合作伙伴鸿海提升产能以满足 "疯狂 "的人工智能需求
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司计划提高服务器产能，以满足对用于开发人工智能的英伟达（Nvidia）公司芯片比预期更强劲的需求，这反映了该公司对人工智能支出将保持高位的预期。【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. plans to boost server capacity to meet stronger-than-anticipated demand for Nvidia Corp. chips used to develop AI, reflecting its expectations that spending on artificial intelligence will stay high.】

item.title: 欧盟将通过出售两种债券筹资 100 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟正在通过银行出售更多 2027 年 12 月和 2039 年 10 月到期的债券，以筹集第四季度的第一笔资金。【原文：The European Union is selling more bonds maturing in December 2027 and October 2039 through banks as it seeks to raise the first funds of the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 贸易关系恶化，中国对欧洲白兰地征税
item.description: 在欧盟决定提高对中国电动汽车的关税几天后，中国对来自欧盟的白兰地征税，使贸易争端升级。【原文：China imposed a levy on brandy from the European Union, escalating a trade dispute days after the bloc’s decision to boost tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles.】

item.title: 英国食品杂货价格通胀率回升至 2
item.description: 研究公司 Kantar 的数据显示，上个月英国的食品通胀率有所反弹。【原文：Grocery inflation bounced back in the UK last month, according to research company Kantar.】

item.title: 沙特基金减持任天堂股份，此前曾表示希望获得更多股份
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯主权财富基金披露已出售其在任天堂公司（Nintendo Co.【原文：Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund disclosed it’s sold down its stake in Nintendo Co., days after a senior executive said it was weighing deploying more capital into the Kyoto-based game company.】

item.title: Salesforce 支持的量子初创公司获得洛克希德-马丁公司资助
item.description: 由 Salesforce 风险投资公司（Salesforce Ventures）支持的量子技术初创公司 Q-Ctrl 从包括洛克希德-马丁风险投资公司（Lockheed Martin Ventures）在内的投资者那里筹集了 5900 万美元，这是人们对量子可能的军事应用越来越感兴趣的最新迹象。【原文：Salesforce Ventures-backed quantum technology startup Q-Ctrl raised $59 million from investors including Lockheed Martin Ventures, the latest sign of growing interest in quantum’s possible military applications.】

item.title: 迪拜酋长的公司考虑在城市住房热潮中设立新的房地产投资信托基金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，迪拜统治者拥有的庞大投资集团迪拜控股公司（Dubai Holding）正在考虑设立一个房地产投资信托基金，以充分利用迪拜的房地产繁荣。【原文：Dubai Holding, a sprawling investment conglomerate owned by the emirate’s ruler, is considering setting up a real estate investment trust to capitalize on the city’s property boom, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 外资对南非兴趣减弱，兰特波动率下滑
item.description: 南非兰特是九年来最平静的时候，但波动率的下降却指向一个令人担忧的原因：投资者对该国的兴趣长期下降。【原文：The South African rand is the calmest it’s been in nine years, but the drop in volatility points to a troubling cause: a long-term decline in investor interest in the country.】

item.title: 德国工业生产因汽车产量波动而反弹
item.description: 德国工业生产在 8 月份出现反弹，消除了一个月前的降幅，为制造业带来了一些企稳的希望，因为欧洲最大的经济体正努力应对经济衰退的担忧。【原文：German industrial production rebounded in August to erase a drop a month earlier, offering some hope of stabilization for manufacturing as Europe’s largest economy grapples with recession fears.】

item.title: 沃达丰与谷歌合作推广人工智能手机和服务
item.description: 沃达丰集团（Vodafone Group Plc）已与 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Vodafone Group Plc has partnered with Alphabet Inc.’s Google to bring cloud services, generative artificial intelligence tools and cybersecurity to its customers in Europe and Africa.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：中国市场情绪低迷，英国股市将下跌
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所集团公司的标志，位于伦敦金融城该公司的办公中庭。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The logo of London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 欧洲央行将评估经济疲软对价格的影响：埃尔德森致函德洛
item.description: 欧洲央行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森（Frank Elderson）告诉斯洛文尼亚《Delo》报，欧元区经济弱于预期，欧洲央行必须在下周的会议上评估对消费者价格的连锁反应。【原文：The euro-zone economy is weaker than expected and the European Central Bank must assess the knock-on effect for consumer prices at its meeting next week, Executive Board member Frank Elderson told Slovenia’s Delo newspaper.】

item.title: 谷歌与公用事业公司商谈数据中心核电事宜
item.description: 谷歌正在与美国和其他国家的公用事业公司合作，评估将核能作为其数据中心能源的可能性，这凸显了人们对利用原子能为人工智能热潮提供能源的浓厚兴趣。【原文：Google is working with utilities in the US and other countries to assess nuclear power as a possible energy source for its data centers, underscoring surging interest in using atomic energy to feed the artificial intelligence boom.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 新兴市场货币交易商聚焦美国大选，推动汇率波动
item.description: 美国总统大选开始让新兴市场投资者感到焦虑不安，货币波动出现了六年来最持续的增长。【原文：The US presidential election is starting to give emerging-market investors the jitters, judging by the most sustained increase in currency volatility in six years.】
